Class FillService

extends java.lang.Object

    • FillGenerations

      public ResultMessage FillGenerations()
      Create users and events and insert them into the DB

    • insertFamilyRecursive

      private void insertFamilyRecursive​(java.sql.Connection conn, Person child, int currentGeneration, int totalGenerations)
      Recursive function to create a family tree with new Persons and their own events
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection to DB
      child - Primary Person in family tree
      currentGeneration - Number of current generation, iterator variable
      totalGenerations - Target number of generations
